data.message: Hi Facebook. I don't usually like to complain but if you continue to block the messaging function on your mobile web app I think I will deactivate my account. I don't want to use a separate app to message my Facebook friends. I already stopped using the Facebook iOS app because you blocked the messaging functionality on that app. Maybe this will be a good excuse to reclaim all the excess time I sink into social media. Just my two cents!

replies.message: We hear your concern, Edmund. We're confident Messenger is the way to provide a faster and more reliable experience. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2ewOPtL. -Joe
I am having similar problems!! I am very aggrevated that people who don't like you opinions on a post can just stop you from posting your opinions, especially during an elections.

I don't think you should give people that right! Now if it's threatening, or not appropriate ie, cussing ,threatening I can see that, but people have a constitutional right to express their opinions. I am blocked from liking Republican opinions in my feed that is wrong and I want it fixed!
